TextLibrary.Text: Tarn! You had no intention of meeting with us.
Tarn! You had no intention of meeting with us.
I have every intention. I wanted to interact with you and your asset. I used Vortraag mercenaries to do exactly that.
I have every intention. I wanted to interact with you and your asset. I used Vortraag mercenaries to do exactly that.
Call it what you like, General. To me it's still an ambush.
Call it what you like, General. To me it's still an ambush.
This is war, young man. We must test your resolve before we build an alliance.
This is war, young lady. We must test your resolve before we build an alliance.
An alliance? You've got to be joking.
An alliance? You've got to be joking.
Trident will be in touch. Keep this channel open.
Trident will be in touch. Keep this channel open.
